title: The best quotes from Wiley’s tell-all 1Xtra interview with Dotty
text:
“Interview me now, let’s go.”



Wiley said those words yesterday at 10am, after sounding off about Drake on Twitter. And within a few hours, he was chatting to Dotty over the phone in what might go down as one of the classic Wiley interviews.

The Godfather of Grime had a few things to get off his chest. He followed up previously-aired arguments about Ed Sheeran and Drake being “culture vultures” and not supporting the grime scene, but that wasn’t even the half of it.

Listen to the interview in full above, and check out some of the standout quotes below.
description: "Your money is dead. I’ll throw it in Tower Bridge."
